SELECT CASE WHEN AccountCode = 'Total' THEN 'Total' ELSE AccountCode END AS AccountCode ,Cnt ,Amount ,AccountName FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(A.AccountCode, 'Total') AccountCode ,COUNT(*) Cnt ,SUM(Amount) Amount ,AccountName FROM (SELECT ProofCode, 1 , AEAD.Amount AS Amount
,AEAD.StandardBriefID AccountCode, AEAD.StandardBriefName AccountName
,AEAD.AccountCode AccountCode, AEAD.AccountName AccountName
FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup USR_CUD ON AEA.RegisterID = USR_CUD.UserCode AND USR_CUD.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE CONCAT(#{payDate},'%')
AND AEAD.CostCenterCode = #{deptCode}
AND AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code}
AND USR_CUD.DeptCode IN ( SELECT GroupCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group WHERE GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupPath LIKE CONCAT('%;',#{stdCode},';%') )
AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' ) A GROUP BY AccountCode with ROLLUP) AA ORDER BY Amount DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE 1=1 AND C.UserCode = #{UR_Code} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = #{state} #진행:288/완료:528 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL

SELECT A.ProcessID , B.WorkItemID , C.PerformerID , A.InitiatorID , A.InitiatorName , A.InitiatorUnitID , A.InitiatorUnitName , C.UserCode , C.UserName , C.SubKind , C.SubKind AS FormSubKind , B.Created , B.TaskID , FormSubject , DATE_FORMAT(B.Created,'%m-%d %H:%i') Created , B.TaskID , U.PhotoPath , D.BusinessData1 , D.BusinessData2 FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID LEFT OUTER JOIN COVI_SMART4J.sys_object_user AS U ON U.UserCode = A.InitiatorID WHERE 1=1 AND C.UserCode = #{UR_Code} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND D.BusinessData1 = 'APPROVAL' AND B.State = #{state} #진행:288/완료:528 AND A.ProcessState = 288 AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL ORDER BY A.EndDate desc LIMIT 3

SELECT AEA.ExpenceApplicationID , AEA.CompanyCode , AEA.ApplicationTitle , AEA.ApplicationType , AEA.ApplicationStatus , AEA.RegisterID , USR.DisplayName RegisterName , AEA.ProcessID
, DATE_FORMAT( IFNULL(AEA.ApplicationDate, AEA.RegistDate), '%m-%d %H:%i') AS ApplicationDate , AEA.RequestType , AEA.RegistDate , AEA.ChargeJob
, AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID , AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID cdRownum , DATE_FORMAT( AEAL.ProofDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS ProofDate , DATE_FORMAT( AEAL.PostingDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS PostingDate , AEAL.ProofCode
, AEAL.CardUID , AEAL.CashUID , AEAL.TaxUID , AEAL.TaxType , AEAL.TaxCode , AEAL.PayAdjustMethod , AEAL.PayMethod , AEAL.IsWithholdingTax , AEAL.IncomeTax , AEAL.LocalTax , AEAL.PayDate , AEAL.VendorNo , AEAL.TotalAmount , AEAD.Amount AS Amount , AEAD.AccountCode , c.AccountName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON AEAD.AccountCode = c.AccountCode LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user USR ON AEA.RegisterID = USR.UserCode WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE CONCAT(#{payDate},'%') AND AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code} AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' AND AEAL.ProofCode = #{proofCode} limit 4

SELECT AR.ReceiptID, AR.CompanyCode, AR.ExpenceMgmtCode, AR.UsageText, AR.PhotoDate AS PhotoDate, AR.PhotoDate AS PhotoDateStr, AR.ReceiptType, AR.ReceiptFileID, AR.Active, covi_account4j_si.Fn_GetBaseCodeName('Active', AR.Active, 'ALL') AS ActiveName, AR.RegisterID, DATE_FORMAT(AR.RegistDate, '%m.%d %h:%m') AS RegistDateMDHM, DATE_FORMAT(AR.RegistDate, '%Y.%m.%d') AS RegistDate, concat(REPLACE(ST.FilePath,'{0}',SF.CompanyCode), SF.FilePath , SF.SavedName) URLPath ,AR.AccountCode ,c.AccountName ,TotalAmount ,(SELECT StandardBriefName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief SB WHERE SB.StandardBriefID = AR.StandardBriefID ) StandardBriefName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_receipt AR LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_file SF ON ar.ReceiptFileID = sf.fileid LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_storage ST ON ST.StorageID = SF.StorageID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON AR.AccountCode = c.AccountCode WHERE 1=1 AND AR.RegisterID = #{UR_Code} ORDER BY AR.ReceiptID DESC limit 3

SELECT SUM(Amount) AS AmountSum
,AEAD.StandardBriefID Code, AEAD.StandardBriefName Name
,AEAD.AccountCode Code, AEAD.AccountName Name
FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AS AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup USR_CUD ON AEA.RegisterID = USR_CUD.UserCode AND USR_CUD.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE CONCAT(#{payYear},'%')
AND AEA.RegisterID = #{UR_Code}
AND USR_CUD.DeptCode IN ( SELECT GroupCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group WHERE GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupPath LIKE CONCAT('%;',#{stdCode},';%') )
AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' GROUP BY
AEAD.StandardBriefID
AEAD.AccountCode
ORDER BY SUM(Amount) desc

SELECT '' AS AccountCode,'전체' AS AccountName UNION ALL SELECT
a.StandardBriefID, sb.StandardBriefName
a.AccountCode, c.AccountName
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT AEAD.AccountCode , AEAD.StandardBriefID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD ON AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup USR_CUD ON AEA.RegisterID = USR_CUD.UserCode AND USR_CUD.JobType = 'Origin' WHERE AEA.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND ProofDate LIKE CONCAT(#{payDate},'%')
AND USR_CUD.DeptCode IN ( SELECT GroupCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group WHERE GroupType = 'Dept' AND GroupPath LIKE CONCAT('%;',#{stdCode},';%') )
AND AEA.ApplicationStatus = 'E' ) A JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_account c ON c.AccountCode = a.AccountCode
JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_standard_brief sb ON c.AccountID = sb.AccountID AND a.StandardBriefID = sb.StandardBriefID
WHERE c.IsUse = 'Y'
SELECT deptCode AS UserCode , deptName AS DisplayName , 'dept' AS type FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup WHERE UserCode = #{UR_Code}
SELECT AD.AuditID , AD.RuleCode , AD.StdDescription FROM covi_account4j_si.act_audit AD WHERE ad.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} AND IsUse = 'Y' ORDER BY AuditID DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT CD.Code, cd.CodeName , CD.Reserved1 , CD.Reserved2 FROM covi_account4j_si.act_base_code CD WHERE CD.CodeGroup = 'budgetStd' AND CODE != 'budgetStd' AND IsUse = 'Y'
AND CD.CompanyCode = #{companyCode}
AND CD.CompanyCode in ('ALL', #{companyCode}) ORDER BY CASE WHEN CD.CompanyCode = #{companyCode} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
limit 1

SELECT a.VendorNo , (Select FormName from covi_account4j_si.act_expence_forms AEF WHERE a.RequestType = AEF.FormCode and AEF.CompanyCode = a.CompanyCode) AS RequestTypeName , bgroup.DeptName , covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, usr.MultiDisplayName) AS UserName , TRUNCATE(a.RealPayAmount,0) AS RealPayAmount , VD.BankName , VD.BankAccountNo , VD.BankAccountName FROM ( SELECT AEAL.VendorNo AS VendorNo, AEA.RequestType, AEA.CompanyCode , SUM(CASE WHEN AEAL.RealPayAmount IS NULL THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN (AEAL.ProofCode = 'TaxBill' AND SUM(AEAD.Amount) != AEAL.TotalAmount) THEN SUM(AEAD.Amount) + AEAL.TaxAmount ELSE SUM(AEAD.Amount) END FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID ) ELSE AEAL.RealPayAmount END) AS RealPayAmount FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID # 일반, 프로젝트, 접대비, 출장 WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID IN #{item} GROUP BY AEAL.VendorNo, AEA.RequestType, AEA.CompanyCode ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT VD.VendorID, MAX(VD.VendorNo) AS VendorNo, MIN(VDB.BankID) AS BankID, MAX(VD.VendorName) AS VendorName, MAX(VDB.BankName) AS BankName , MAX(VDB.BankAccountNo) AS BankAccountNo , MAX(VDB.BankAccountName) AS BankAccountName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_vendor_bank VDB JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_vendor VD ON VD.VendorID = VDB.VendorID AND VD.VendorType = 'OR' # 임직원 거래처 Type GROUP BY VD.VendorID ) VD ON VD.VendorNo = a.VendorNo LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user usr ON usr.UserCode = a.VendorNo LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup bgroup ON bgroup.UserCode = usr.UserCode AND bgroup.JobType = 'Origin' ORDER BY deptname, username

SELECT MAX(A.VendorName) AS VendorName, TRUNCATE(SUM(A.RealPayAmount),0) AS RealPayAmount, MAX(A.BankName) AS BankName, MAX(A.BankAccountNo) AS BankAccountNo, MAX(A.BankAccountName) AS BankAccountName FROM ( SELECT AEA.ExpenceApplicationID, AEA.RegisterID, AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID, CASE WHEN AEAL.PayMethod IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN AEAL.ProofCode = 'CorpCard' THEN 'D' ELSE 'C' END ELSE AEAL.PayMethod END AS PayMethod, CASE WHEN AEAL.RealPayAmount IS NULL THEN ( SELECT CASE WHEN ( AEAL.ProofCode = 'TaxBill' AND SUM(AEAD.Amount) != AEAL.TotalAmount ) THEN SUM(AEAD.Amount) + AEAL.TaxAmount ELSE SUM(AEAD.Amount) END FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID ) ELSE AEAL.RealPayAmount END AS RealPayAmount, IFNULL(AEAL.VendorNo, AEA.RegisterID) AS VendorNo, IFNULL(IFNULL(VD.VendorName, ATI.InvoicerCorpName), AEAL.VendorName) AS VendorName, ( SELECT StandardBriefID FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_div AEAD WHERE AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID = AEAD.ExpenceApplicationListID LIMIT 1 ) StandardBriefID , VD.BankName , VD.BankAccountNo , VD.BankAccountName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application AEA INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_application_list AEAL ON AEA.ExpenceApplicationID = AEAL.ExpenceApplicationID #INNER JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user USR ON AEA.RegisterID = USR.UserCode INNER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_expence_forms AEF ON AEA.RequestType = AEF.FormCode and AEF.CompanyCode = AEA.CompanyCode LEFT OUTER JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_taxinvoice ATI ON AEAL.TaxUID = ATI.TaxInvoiceID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT VD.VendorID, MAX(VD.VendorNo) AS VendorNo, MIN(VDB.BankID) AS BankID, MAX(VD.VendorName) AS VendorName, MAX(VDB.BankName) AS BankName , MAX(VDB.BankAccountNo) AS BankAccountNo , MAX(VDB.BankAccountName) AS BankAccountName FROM covi_account4j_si.act_vendor_bank VDB JOIN covi_account4j_si.act_vendor VD ON VD.VendorID = VDB.VendorID AND VD.VendorType != 'OR' GROUP BY VD.VendorID ) VD ON VD.VendorNo = AEAL.VendorNo WHERE 1 = 1 AND AEF.MenuType = 'V' AND AEA.RequestType IN ('VENDOR') AND AEAL.ExpenceApplicationListID IN #{item} ) A WHERE PayMethod = 'C' GROUP BY A.ExpenceApplicationID, A.RegisterID, A.PayMethod, A.VendorNo, A.StandardBriefID
